author: Juliet_Hwang
title: Very cute!
review: 4 baby animals, reasonably priced, and a great expansion to either of the larger zoos.  The Keeper is rather superfluous, and the scenery is just filler.  Still, a good set, as you're buying it for the animals.

author: Erik_
title: Nice small set
review:
Got this beginner Duplo set while travelling abroad. I didn't want my daughter to have to many pieces, yet some basic new animals to play with.
Probably wish they had put a real Lion instead of a cub in this set.
For me the zoo keeper was not a filler, as my wife has taken care of wild animals, and it's a mini-mom :-)
